subject: Re: [junit] Adding Junit to Eclispe
msgSnippet: Hi Gregory, Sorry if this is a stupid question, but are you sure your version of Eclipse has support for Java as well as Javascript development? The JDT (Java
messageBody:
Hi Gregory,

Sorry if this is a stupid question, but are you sure your version of
Eclipse has support for Java as well as Javascript development? The JDT
(Java Development Tools) package is not included in the version list you
provide here.

Cheers,
Ben

On 14/02/11 20:23, Gregory Cooper wrote:
>
> Hi, David
>
> Sorry I gave the version number for the Eclipse ID for Javascript
> Developers. Below are the installation details. The Eclipse version is
> 3.6.1:
>
> Eclipse IDE for Javascript Developers 1.3.1.20100916-1202
> epp.package.javascript
> Eclipse Platform 3.6.1.M20100909-0800 org.eclipse.platform.ide
> Eclipse Platform
> 3.6.1.r361_v20100909-9gF78GrkFqw7GrsZnvz0JWNTeb6fue6896L
> org.eclipse.platform.feature.group
> Eclipse Help System 1.2.0.v20100427-7e7jEQFEp4jsWcboLU9l93
> org.eclipse.help.feature.group
> Eclipse RCP 3.6.1.r361_v20100827-9OArFLdFjY-ThSQXmKvKz0_T
> org.eclipse.rcp.feature.group
> Equinox p2 Provisioning 2.0.1.r361_v20100903-897HFZFFZRuSD2LMtVxyz0Vr
> org.eclipse.equinox.p2.user.ui.feature.group
>
> Thanks, Greg
>
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> From: david@... <mailto:david%40saff.net>
> Date: Mon, 14 Feb 2011 11:53:49 -0500
> Subject: Re: [junit] Adding Junit to Eclispe
>
> Greg,
>
> Just to be clear, you're hoping to see New > JUnit Test Case on the
> right-click list, right?
>
> Are you sure your Eclipse version is 1.3.1.20100916-1201? Eclipse 3
> was many years ago. Just a first check. Good luck,
>
> David Saff
>
> On Fri, Feb 11, 2011 at 4:34 PM, Greg Cooper <gregory_cooper@...
> <mailto:gregory_cooper%40hotmail.com>> wrote:
> > Not sure if this is the right forum, but I am trying to get Junit to
> show in the drop down menu on eclipse. I have right click on the project
> and clicked on New and was expecting to see Junit as an option here
> which it wasn't. It also is not showing as an option under the Other
> selection either. This for:
> >
> > Eclipse version 1.3.1.20100916-1201
> > Junit4.9b2
> > Junit4.5
> > Junit3.8.2
> >
> > Any help would be appreciated.
> > Thanks, Greg
> >
